props.name: hrefBuilder
props.description: A function to generate links based on page number.

props.name: marginPageCount
props.description: How many pages to always show at the left and right of the component.

props.name: onPageChange
props.description: Called with event and page number when a page is clicked.

props.name: showPages
props.type: boolean | { narrow?: boolean, regular?: boolean, wide?: boolean }
props.description: Whether or not to show the individual page links.

props.name: surroundingPageCount
props.description: How many pages to display on each side of the currently selected page.

props.name: renderPage
props.description: Provide a custom component or render prop to render each page link within the component.
